title: Spring Shedding Season: 22 Cat Memes Clinging to Your Soul Like Fur on a Black Sweater
description: Oh, spring. First of all, bless you for that giant sneeze you just did. Second of all, it's time to sweep that cat fur that's clinging to everything around your house. You don't have a couch anymore - you have a sittable lump of cat hair. You don't have food anymore - you have edible fur in various tastes. You don't have a floor anymore - you have a wall-to-wall carpet made of everything your cat is shedding this season. So, you know, it's time to take out that broom, the vacuum cleaner, the Dyson, or whatever you use to clean the house - and get some spring work done.If you cleaned well and no more fur is clinging to everything you own, you can now see the hidden comical cat memes that were under that fluffy coat. They might not be as floofy as your feline friend, but they're definitely as funny as cats, as cute as cats, as hilarious as cats, and as wholesome as cats. It's a great way to have a laugh on this lovely spring day.
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: Spring Shedding Season: 22 Cat Memes Clinging to Your Soul Like Fur on a Black Sweater - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Oh, spring. First of all, bless you for that giant sneeze you just did. Second of all, it's time to sweep that cat fur that's clinging to everything around your house. You don't have a couch anymore - you have a sittable lump of cat hair. You don't have food anymore - you have edible fur in various tastes. You don't have a floor anymore - you have a wall-to-wall carpet made of everything your cat is shedding this season. So, you know, it's time to take out that broom, the vacuum cleaner, the Dyson, or whatever you use to clean the house - and get some spring work done.

If you cleaned well and no more fur is clinging to everything you own, you can now see the hidden comical cat memes that were under that fluffy coat. They might not be as floofy as your feline friend, but they're definitely as funny as cats, as cute as cats, as hilarious as cats, and as wholesome as cats. It's a great way to have a laugh on this lovely spring day.
